threats.title: AB01 Failure Of Cloud Application (from https)
threats.description: Unexpected failure of the cloud application (because of https)

threats.title: AB02 Connection Lost To Cloud Application (from https)
threats.description: Connection lost to the cloud application (because of https)

threats.title: AC01 Malware From Cloud Application (from https)
threats.description: Malicious content (malware) from the cloud application (because of https)

threats.title: AC02 Public Network Access To Cloud Application (from https)
threats.description: Remote user connects to the cloud application though a public network (e.g. Wi-Fi) and can be attacked by a third-party adversary (because of https)

threats.title: AC03 Social Engineering Against Remote User (from https)
threats.description: Remote user suffers from Social Engineering attacks, performed by third-party adversary (e.g. including the cloud application into phishing schema) (because of https)

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat (from https)
threats.description: A generic repudiation threat (because of https)

threats.title: Generic spoofing threat (from https)
threats.description: A generic spoofing threat (because of https)

threats.title: AB01 Failure Of Cloud Application (from sql)
threats.description: Unexpected failure of the cloud application (because of sql)

threats.title: AB02 Connection Lost To Cloud Application (from sql)
threats.description: Connection lost to the cloud application (because of sql)

threats.title: AD01 Broken Authentication (from https)
threats.description: No authentication or broken (weak) authentication by the cloud application (because of https)

threats.title: AD02 Broken Access Control (from https)
threats.description: No access control or broken (weak) access control by the cloud application (because of https)

threats.title: AD03 Data Breach By Cloud Application (from https)
threats.description: Data breach (information disclosure) by the cloud application (because of https)

threats.title: AD04 Data Loss By Cloud Application (from https)
threats.description: Data loss (modification) by the cloud application (because of https)

threats.title: AD05 Backup Of CloudApplication Lost (from https)
threats.description: Lost of cloud application backup (because of https)

threats.title: AD06 Backups Of Cloud Application Stolen (from https)
threats.description: Disclosure of cloud application backups (because of https)

threats.title: AD07 Logs Of Cloud Application Lost (from https)
threats.description: Lost of cloud application logs (because of https)

threats.title: AD08 Logs Of Cloud Application Stolen (from https)
threats.description: Disclosure of sensitive information from cloud application logs (because of https)

threats.title: AE01 DDoS Attack To Cloud Application (from https)
threats.description: DDoS/DoS attack against cloud application from the Internet (because of https)

threats.title: AE02 EDoS Attack To Cloud Application (from https)
threats.description: EDoS (Economic Denial of Service) attack against cloud application from the Internet (because of https)

threats.title: AE03 Network Attacks To Cloud Application (from https)
threats.description: Remote side can perform remote malicious activities based on misconfiguration or vulnerabilities of the cloud application (because of https)

threats.title: AE04 Cloud Application Abuse (from https)
threats.description: Malicious usage (abuse) of cloud application from the Internet (e.g. sending spam, participating botnet, mining) after gain control on it (because of https)

threats.title: AE05 Block Shared Resources Of Cloud Application (from https)
threats.description: Blocking shared resources of cloud application (e.g. shared external IP) by a third-part reputation service (because of https)

threats.title: AE06 Disclosure Of Credentials Of Cloud Management Interface (from https)
threats.description: Disclosure of user credentials of management interface of cloud application (because of https)
